column2: an A.M. Eatery////I want to write like an entire review just about our waitress Kandra ("Like Sandra but with a K"). Â She brought her entire
column3: authentic self to work today and had an incredible
column4: hilarious personality. She was working her tail off and cracking jokes. We ended up taking pictures with her and that's not like a thing that we do. She sang happy birthday to my friend
column5: cracked jokes about us in that we-just-met-but-we-might-be-best-friends kind of way
column6: and made great recommendations about tweaks to our order (e.g.
column7: "I would add peppers" or "ya'll need to try this flavor of pancake."). She was spot on with her recommendations.
